title: De Blasio Struggles To Rebuild Trust With NYPD Rank And File
teaser: New York Mayor Bill de Blasio addressed new graduates of the city's police academy on Monday. It was awkward timing for a mayor who's struggling to rebuild trust with the NYPD's rank and file after two officers were shot in their squad car earlier this month.
